sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Weapons with Breach burn through the toughest armor, and are often heavy weapons or starship weapons.  Breach weapons ignore one point of Armor for every rating of Breach (meaning they also ignore 10 points of soak for every rating of Breach).</description> <name>Breach (Passive)</name> <number>WQ0001003</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 04:44:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7f7858202fd46450e0f497eef699b66e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 04:44:36</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
